message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you that I believe will be of great value to your business. I'm offering you a product that I know you'll find extremely beneficial. I'm confident that it will be worth well over the price I'm asking. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. This is a substantial discount from what it's truly worth, and I'm confident it will be a wise investment for you. Let me know your thoughts.
